root.name: Eskimo Games
root.description: Despite sharing the same name as similar, more conservative renderings of tournament games ( Summer Games, Winter Games etc.), Eskimo Games is really a collection of a few mini games which generally reward a quick and eye and swift hand. A snowball fight, serving ice cream, fighting a polar bear and so forth. The graphics are deliberately cartoonish and the games are easy to pick up and master.
